text: Allāhviṭattilum, avaṉuṭaiya tūtariṭattilum iṇaivaittu vaṇaṅkupavarkaḷiṉ uṭaṉpaṭikkaikku evvāṟu matippirukka muṭiyum? Āyiṉum, ciṟappuṟṟa masjitiṉ muṉ uṅkaḷuṭaṉ uṭaṉpaṭikkai ceytu koṇṭavarkaḷ (taṅkaḷ uṭaṉpaṭikkaiyiṉpaṭi) uṅkaḷuṭaṉ uṟutiyāka irukkum varai, nīṅkaḷum avarkaḷuṭaṉ uṟutiyākavē iruṅkaḷ. Niccayamāka allāh iṟaiyaccamuṭaiyavarkaḷai nēcikkiṟāṉ
